pageTitle: Mountain Hardwear Women's Ediza T-Shirt | Outdoorplay.com
textBeforeTable: Mountain Hardwear Women's Ediza Long Sleeve T Shirt - The Women's Ediza Long Sleeve T Shirt by Mountain Hardwear is a lightweight hiking T that helps to keep you comfortable out on the trail. Made of fast-drying Litetrek Double Knit Pique Mesh, this top wicks moisture away from your skin and has an antimicrobial finish to control odor. Tipa Warp Knit Jersey shoulder panels offer abrasion resistance when carrying a pack. The flat-lock seam construction prevents chaffing during those all-day hikes. Lace up your boots and head to the trail in the Mountain Hardwear Women's Ediza Long Sleeve T Shirt. Sizing for Mountain Hardwear Women's Ediza Long Sleeve T Shirt: Price Match Guarantee Product Warranty Shipping info Easy returns Shopping Info 25 in. average back length 5 oz average weight Semi-fitted active fit UPF 25 sun protection Antimicrobial finish controls odor Abrasion resistant panels over shoulders Flat-lock seam construction Wicking, fast drying, stretch fabrics 100% polyester Tipa Warp Knit Jersey shoulder panels 100% polyester Litetrek Double Knit Pique Mesh Womens Ediza Long Sleeve T Shirt
